2010.context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. Founded to democratize BI. Cloud-native analytics platform.

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Powerful data visualization tool founded in 2003, already established in the market when Domo was founded

competitors.name: QlikView
competitors.notes: Business intelligence and data visualization platform, well-established by 2010

competitors.name: MicroStrategy
competitors.notes: High performance, scalable BI platform delivering interactive dashboards and analytics, established player

competitors.name: IBM Cognos
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI and performance management software suite, major incumbent in 2010

competitors.name: SAP BusinessObjects
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI platform, major competitor in the traditional BI space

competitors.name: Oracle BI
competitors.notes: Oracle's business intelligence platform, established enterprise solution

2015.query: Domo competitors 2015 business intelligence BI market
2015.context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. Rapid growth and high valuation. Enterprise BI challenger.

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Market leader in data visualization and business intelligence, known for intuitive drag-and-drop interface and powerful analytics capabilities. Tableau was the dominant player in the self-service BI space in 2015.

competitors.name: QlikView / Qlik Sense
competitors.notes: Major BI platform known for its associative data model allowing exploratory data analysis. QlikView was the established product while Qlik Sense (launched 2014) was the newer cloud-focused offering.

competitors.name: Microsoft Power BI
competitors.notes: Microsoft's business intelligence platform launched in 2015, leveraging Microsoft's ecosystem and offering competitive pricing. Rapidly gaining adoption due to Office 365 integration.

competitors.name: Sisense
competitors.notes: BI platform focused on handling complex data from multiple sources with embedded analytics capabilities, competing in the self-service BI market.

competitors.name: Looker
competitors.notes: Data exploration and business intelligence platform (acquired by Google in 2019) that used SQL-based data modeling, popular among tech-savvy organizations.

competitors.name: SAP BusinessObjects
competitors.notes: Traditional enterprise BI suite from SAP, representing the older generation of BI tools that required significant IT involvement.

competitors.name: IBM Cognos Analytics
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI and performance management solution, part of the traditional BI market that Domo was disrupting with its cloud-first approach.

2020.context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. Focus on profitability. Data apps and embedded analytics.

competitors.name: Microsoft Power BI
competitors.notes: Cloud-based analytics platform integrated with Microsoft ecosystem, became major competitor after 2011 launch

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Leading data visualization tool with interactive dashboards and reports, acquired by Salesforce in 2019

competitors.name: Looker
competitors.notes: Cloud-based BI platform acquired by Google Cloud in 2019, known for LookML modeling language

competitors.name: Qlik Sense
competitors.notes: Self-service data visualization and discovery application, evolution of QlikView

competitors.name: Sisense
competitors.notes: BI platform for complex data analytics, competitor in cloud BI space

competitors.name: MicroStrategy
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI platform with interactive dashboards and advanced analytics capabilities

competitors.name: Amazon QuickSight
competitors.notes: AWS cloud-based BI service for visualizations and ad-hoc analysis, launched 2016

competitors.name: IBM Cognos Analytics
competitors.notes: Enterprise BI platform with reporting and dashboarding features

competitors.name: Zoho Analytics
competitors.notes: Self-service BI and data analytics software with data visualizations and dashboards

competitors.name: Alteryx
competitors.notes: Data analytics platform noted as strong overall alternative to Domo

2024.context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. AI-powered analytics features. Competing with Tableau, Power BI.

competitors.name: Microsoft Power BI
competitors.notes: Dominant player with competitive $20/user pricing, extensive Microsoft ecosystem integration, easier setup than Domo

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Top alternative with advanced visualization capabilities, though can be expensive for large server deployments

competitors.name: Looker (Google Cloud)
competitors.notes: Cloud-based tool with Looker Studio offering simple interface and minimal learning curve, backed by LookML semantic modeling

competitors.name: ThoughtSpot
competitors.notes: AI-powered search analytics with higher G2 ratings than Domo in self-service category, intuitive UI

competitors.name: Mode
competitors.notes: Strong competitor with intuitive SQL editor for analyzing large datasets and building interactive visualizations

competitors.name: MicroStrategy
competitors.notes: Connects with multiple data sources, enables dashboard building and embedded analytics

competitors.name: Amazon QuickSight
competitors.notes: Fast cloud-powered analytics service for building visualizations and ad-hoc analysis

competitors.name: IBM Cognos Analytics
competitors.notes: Wide range of BI tools for monitoring events, creating reports, and analyzing data

competitors.name: Qlik Sense
competitors.notes: Self-service analytics and data visualization platform, continued evolution in associative engine technology

competitors.name: Sisense
competitors.notes: BI platform for complex data analytics and embedded analytics use cases

competitors.name: Ajelix BI
competitors.notes: Emerging AI-powered BI alternative focused on data analysis

competitors.name: Datapad
competitors.notes: Modern BI alternative with focus on mobile and simplified analytics

2025.context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. Business cloud platform. Data apps and AI integration.

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: Market share leader in Business Intelligence category with 23.71%, significantly ahead of Domo's 0.60%.

competitors.name: Microsoft Power BI
competitors.notes: Second by market share at 14.42%. Ideal for businesses using Microsoft products. Deep integrations with Excel, Azure, and other Microsoft services.

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Third by market share at 13.36%. Salesforce-owned BI platform. Known for rich data visualization and interactive drag-and-drop interface. Customizable reports, real-time analysis.

competitors.name: Zoho Analytics
competitors.notes: Comprehensive BI solution with AI-powered assistant Zia for automated insights, trends, data-driven decisions. 500+ native data connectors. Clear transparent pricing starting at $8/user/month.

competitors.name: Qlik Sense
competitors.notes: Independent data analysis for enterprises with AI, NLP, automation. Shining feature: associative engine linking related data sets to uncover meaningful insights.

competitors.name: Amazon QuickSight
competitors.notes: BI tool for visualizing and analyzing data with interactive dashboards and ML-driven insights. Strong integration with AWS products (Redshift, S3). ML-powered insights and natural language querying.

competitors.name: ThoughtSpot
competitors.notes: Search-driven platform enabling natural language questions for instant insights. Combines AI-powered analytics with user-friendly dashboards. Makes data accessible to everyone.

competitors.name: Luzmo
competitors.notes: Excels at embedded dashboards for self-service analytics. Build advanced analytics dashboards for your product. Powerful API to connect to data stack for real-time analysis.

competitors.name: Looker
competitors.notes: Google Cloud's business intelligence and data analytics platform.

competitors.name: Sisense
competitors.notes: AI-driven analytics platform for embedding analytics.
